Race.SpecificTitle: PW Sales Tax Rededication -- 1% S&U - PJ - Perp
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana (the ''Parish"), rededicate the use of the proceeds of the one percent (1%) sales and use tax authorized to be levied and collected in perpetuity at an election held on September 29, 1984, for solid waste and disposal purposes (an estimated $1,225,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), such that all Tax proceeds, including amounts previously collected, but unexpended, shall be rededicated for (i) funding waste collection and disposal, including, but not limited to, providing, maintaining, operating, constructing, acquiring and/or improving solid waste collection and disposal facilities, equipment and/or services, and (ii) constructing, improving, maintaining and/or resurfacing public roads in the Parish, including acquiring, operating and maintaining equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire District No. Six -- 13.83 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire District No. Six Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire District No. Six of Grant Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of thirteen and eighty-three hundredths (13.83) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $103,725 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, operating and maintaining the fire protection facilities of the District, including all necessary equipment?
